Others: West Indies will take on Australia in three T20 internationals in February.
The matches will occur at three Australian venues not used during the ODI series, with those matches in Melbourne, Sydney, and Canberra.
The first T20 match will be held in Hobart, the second in Adelaide, and the third in Perth.
Every match of Australia's summer of cricket, including Tests, ODIs, and T20Is, will be broadcast live on Fox Cricket and streamed on Kayo Sports.
The squads for the T20 series have been announced, with Mitch Marsh leading Australia and Rovman Powell leading the West Indies.
